settings.richtext_answer: Yes, all of our products are vegan. Our gummies use pectin which is 100% plant-based.

settings.text_question: How often can I take Nuchu products?
settings.richtext_answer: You can take Nuchu products daily. Please follow the Suggested Use on each product.

settings.text_question: How should I store my gummies?
settings.richtext_answer: It's best to store your gummies in a cool and dry place. Avoid direct sunlight.

settings.text_question: With no added sugar or sweeteners, how come Nuchu gummies taste sweet?
settings.richtext_answer: Our gummies are made with Fructooligosaccharide (FOS), a naturally sweet fibre found in plants.

settings.text_question: Can I take these gummies every day?
settings.richtext_answer: Absolutely! Our wellness gummies are crafted for daily use, ensuring you get a delightful dose of essential vitamins to support your overall well-being
